SELECT SEQ_ZIP_BOARD.nextval FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO ZIP_BOARD (ZIP_ID, USERS_ID, ZIP_PET_CATEGORY, ZIP_TITLE, ZIP_CONTENT) VALUES (#{zipId}, #{usersId}, #{zipPetCategory}, #{zipTitle}, #{zipContent})
mapper.select: SELECT ZB.ZIP_ID, ZB.ZIP_PET_CATEGORY, ZB.ZIP_TITLE, ZB.ZIP_CONTENT, ZB.ZIP_UPDATE_AT, ZB.ZIP_VIEWCOUNT, U.USERS_ID, U.NICKNAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ZIP_ANSWER ZA WHERE ZA.ZIP_ID = ZB.ZIP_ID) AS ANSWER_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ZIP_LIKE ZL WHERE ZL.ZIP_ID = ZB.ZIP_ID) AS LIKE_COUNT FROM ZIP_BOARD ZB JOIN USERS U ON ZB.USERS_ID = U.USERS_ID ORDER BY ZIP_ID DESC

SELECT ZB.ZIP_ID, ZB.ZIP_PET_CATEGORY, ZB.ZIP_TITLE, ZB.ZIP_CONTENT, ZB.ZIP_UPDATE_AT, ZB.ZIP_VIEWCOUNT, U.USERS_ID, U.NICKNAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ZIP_ANSWER ZA WHERE ZA.ZIP_ID = ZB.ZIP_ID) AS ANSWER_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ZIP_LIKE ZL WHERE ZL.ZIP_ID = ZB.ZIP_ID) AS LIKE_COUNT FROM ZIP_BOARD ZB JOIN USERS U ON ZB.USERS_ID = U.USERS_ID WHERE ZIP_ID = #{zipId}

SELECT ZB.ZIP_ID, ZB.ZIP_PET_CATEGORY, ZB.ZIP_TITLE, ZB.ZIP_CONTENT, ZB.ZIP_UPDATE_AT, ZB.ZIP_VIEWCOUNT, U.USERS_ID, U.NICKNAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ZIP_ANSWER ZA WHERE ZA.ZIP_ID = ZB.ZIP_ID) AS ANSWER_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ZIP_LIKE ZL WHERE ZL.ZIP_ID = ZB.ZIP_ID) AS LIKE_COUNT FROM ZIP_BOARD ZB JOIN USERS U ON ZB.USERS_ID = U.USERS_ID ORDER BY ZIP_ID DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ZIP_BOARD ZB JOIN USERS U ON ZB.USERS_ID = U.USERS_ID
AND ZB.ZIP_PET_CATEGORY = #{cond.category}
AND (
U.USERS_ID LIKE '%' || #{cond.keyword} || '%'
ZB.ZIP_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{cond.keyword} || '%'
ZB.ZIP_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{cond.keyword} || '%'
)
